# release

**Instance Property**

The callback used to release values as they are removed from the collection. If `NULL`, values are not released. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayReleaseCallBack] for a description of this callback.

## Declaration

```swift
var release: CFArrayReleaseCallBack!
```
title: release
